text: Colonel Nicholas Joseph "Nick" Fury is a fictional war hero and spy who helps Marvel Comics heroes such as Hulk, the Fantastic Four, Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and Spider-Man. He formed two groups one with spies S.H.I.E.L.D. and another one with superheroes, the Avengers. He has an eye- patch and uses guns or advanced technology to fight criminals. He used to serve in World War II with Captain America. ==Movies and TV== In the Marvel movie versions about some heroes such as Iron Man, Thor, Captain America: The First Avenger, Iron Man 2, Iron Man 3, The Avengers, Captain America: The Winter Soldier, Avengers: Age of Ultron and Spider-Man: Far from Home, Secret Invasion, and The Marvels, he is played by actor Samuel L. Jackson. ==References== Category:Characters created by Stan Lee Category:Marvel Comics movie characters Category:Marvel Comics mutates
title: Nick Fury
